sect1.title: Stream a file with VLC

listitem.para: video1.xyz is the file you want to stream,
the IP address of the machine you want to unicast to ;
or the DNS name the machine you want to unicast to ;
12 is the value of the TTL (Time To Live) of your IP packets (which means that the stream will be able to cross 11 routers).

sect1.para: If you want to stream the file continuously, add the --loop option.

sect1.title: Stream a file with VLS

listitem.para: video1.xyz is the file you want to stream,
the IP address of the machine you want to unicast to ;
or the DNS name the machine you want to unicast to ;
12 is the value of the TTL (Time To Live) of your IP packets (which means that the stream will be able to cross 11 routers).

sect1.para: When you want to stop VLS, use the key combination Ctrlc.
If you want to stream the file continuously, add the --loop option.
